sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useContext, useEffect} from 'react' import {UserContext} from '../context/UserContext' import { useParams, } from 'react-router-dom' const EditProfile = () => { let [userData, setUserData] = useState([]) let {userInfo} = useContext(UserContext) let username = useParams().username let getUserData = async () => { let response = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/member/api/edit/${username}`) let data = await response.json() setUserData(data) } console.log(userData) useEffect(() => { getUserData() }, []) return (
# First Last Handle
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
) } export default EditProfile
